data.message: Trump.... At least he is trying to do something other than just run his mouth. How is America so racist? Have you looked at the rest of the world?  Stupid move man . Do you, I'll do me. Trump may be a white bread but he is at least making moves, Obama fucked this country up, ruined healthcare, weakened the military and made very poor foreign policy decisions. Rap about that, how we got where we are at. Trump didn't put us here 100,000 piss poor leaders over the last thirty years did, just pot on boil now. Think man.  Look at the leaders of your town, that wasn't Trump but Detroit got left out and is in shambles. I feel your passion for positive change but Trump is just a dude. Not the real problem.

replies.message: I wish that were really Trump Kevin Pittman.
